post.title: Harsh words in the Ruqqus FAQ

body:
The Swedish Security Service (security police) recently contacted the FBI to get information on a person they claimed was suspected of terrorism.

FBI permitted the request with the wording that the information may only be used “for the sole purpose of preventing or responding to threats of domestic or international terrorism”.

Turns out they just wanted to prosecute the 15 year old for “hate speech”.

So we’re not safe even under US jurisdiction. Our government and police will just lie to bust people for wrongthink.
body_html:
The Swedish Security Service (security police) recently contacted the FBI to get information on a person they claimed was suspected of terrorism.

FBI permitted the request with the wording that the information may only be used “for the sole purpose of preventing or responding to threats of domestic or international terrorism”.

Turns out they just wanted to prosecute the 15 year old for “hate speech”.

So we’re not safe even under US jurisdiction. Our government and police will just lie to bust people for wrongthink.

post.title: Harsh words in the Ruqqus FAQ

body:
I don't know about the other laws, but this one (1st amendment) is rock solid IMO. It's always possible people use the protection of free speech for harmful things (as speech targetting marginalized groups), but harmful speech is better fought with speech than with force.

And even the exceptions look fairly legitimate IMO - child porn (technically sharing CP would be speech, but it relies in actions that are harmful towards children) and calls for unlawful action (even if it contains speech, the call for action itself is an engagement, more behaviour-like than speech-like).
body_html:
I don't know about the other laws, but this one (1st amendment) is rock solid IMO. It's always possible people use the protection of free speech for harmful things (as speech targetting marginalized groups), but harmful speech is better fought with speech than with force.

And even the exceptions look fairly legitimate IMO - child porn (technically sharing CP would be speech, but it relies in actions that are harmful towards children) and calls for unlawful action (even if it contains speech, the call for action itself is an engagement, more behaviour-like than speech-like).

parent.body:
The Swedish Security Service (security police) recently contacted the FBI to get information on a person they claimed was suspected of terrorism.

FBI permitted the request with the wording that the information may only be used “for the sole purpose of preventing or responding to threats of domestic or international terrorism”.

Turns out they just wanted to prosecute the 15 year old for “hate speech”.

So we’re not safe even under US jurisdiction. Our government and police will just lie to bust people for wrongthink.
parent.body_html:
The Swedish Security Service (security police) recently contacted the FBI to get information on a person they claimed was suspected of terrorism.

FBI permitted the request with the wording that the information may only be used “for the sole purpose of preventing or responding to threats of domestic or international terrorism”.

Turns out they just wanted to prosecute the 15 year old for “hate speech”.

So we’re not safe even under US jurisdiction. Our government and police will just lie to bust people for wrongthink.
